code: import React from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{Helmet}from'react-helmet-async';import{sortedBlogPosts}from'../blogData';import Seo from'../components/Seo';import NotFoundPage from'./NotFoundPage';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BlogPostPage=()=>{const{slug}=useParams();const post=sortedBlogPosts.find(p=>p.slug===slug);if(!post){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NotFoundPage,{});}const PostComponent=post.component;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Helmet,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("link",{rel:"canonical",href:`https://trueallyguide.com/blog/${post.slug}`})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Seo,{title:post.title,description:post.description,type:"article",path:`/blog/${post.slug}`,article:{title:post.title,authorName:'Marica Šinko',datePublished:post.date,image:post.image}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostComponent,{})]});};export default BlogPostPage;
